hero.description: A modern, privacy‑focused baby tracker that helps you monitor your little one's growth and daily activities. Self‑host for complete data control.

featuresSection.description: Baby Tracker includes the essentials to make caregiving easier. From feeding schedules to growth milestones, we've got you covered.

feedingTracking.title: Feeding tracking
feedingTracking.description: Log breastfeeding, bottle feeding, and solid foods. Track duration, amount, and type to support balanced nutrition.

diaperTracking.title: Diaper changes
diaperTracking.description: Record wet and dirty diapers. Monitor patterns that help spot hydration or health issues early.

sleepTracking.title: Sleep patterns
sleepTracking.description: Track sleep sessions to understand habits. Log naps and nighttime sleep to build a healthy routine.

growthMonitoring.title: Growth monitoring
growthMonitoring.description: Record weight, height, and head circumference. Visualize growth with charts and compare to WHO percentiles.

historicalData.title: Activity history
historicalData.description: Access the full history of tracked activities. Filter and export to share with care providers or keep for your own records.

privacyAndSecurity.title: Privacy & security
privacyAndSecurity.description: Self‑hosting keeps data on your server. No third‑party access. No data mining. Just you in control.

openSourceSection.description: Baby Tracker is open source—own, manage, and secure your data. No subscriptions. No hidden fees. Just a tool built for you.

completeControl.title: Complete control
completeControl.description: Host on your own server or any cloud. You stay in control of data and experience.

noMonthlyFees.title: No monthly fees
noMonthlyFees.description: No recurring subscriptions. Download, install, and use Baby Tracker free—forever.

communityDriven.title: Community driven
communityDriven.description: Contribute, suggest features, and be part of a community improving the tool for everyone.

customizable.title: Customizable & extensible
customizable.description: Tailor the app to your needs. Modify and extend functionality freely.

cta.title: Ready to begin the journey?
cta.description: Take control of your baby's data and start tracking milestones today. Free, secure, and fully yours.
cta.footer: Join hundreds of caregivers who trust Baby Tracker

footer.description: A modern, privacy‑focused, open source baby tracker.
